de.lambeck.pned.models.gui

Class GuiModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.gui.GuiModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGuiModel, IModelRename, IModel

    public class GuiModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGuiModel, IModelRename
    Implements the GUI model of a Petri net.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean debug
      Show debug messages?
      private java.lang.String displayName
      This should be the name of the tab.
      private java.util.List<IGuiElement> elements
      List of all elements in this model
      private int maxZValue
      The maximum z value of all elements in this model
      private int minZValue
      The minimum z value of all elements in this model
      private boolean modelModified
      This attribute is set if the model was modified in any way to make sure that the user is asked for "file save" when closing the file.
      private java.lang.String modelName
      This should be the canonical (unique) path name of the file.
      protected IGuiModelController myGuiController
      Reference to the GUI controller.
      private java.util.List<IGuiElement> selected
      List of all elements selected by the user.

        Reference to the GUI controller. (Mainly for returning dirty areas which need repainting.)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiModel

        public GuiModel(java.lang.String modelName,
                java.lang.String displayName,
                IGuiModelController controller)
        Constructs a new GUI model with the name as parameter. (Name is the full path of the file to make sure it is unique.)
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        displayName - The name of the tab (the file name only)
        controller - The GUI controller

    • Method Detail

      • getModelName

        public java.lang.String getModelName()
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Returns the full name of this model. This should be the canonical (unique) path name of the file.
        Specified by:
        getModelName in interface IModel
        Returns:
        The full name

      • setModelName

        public void setModelName(java.lang.String s)
        Description copied from interface: IModelRename
        Sets the name of this model. (Use this method to rename this model in case the user has saved the model under a new file name.)

        Note: This is in a non-public interface because the model controller has to keep his list of models up to date!
        Specified by:
        setModelName in interface IModelRename
        Parameters:
        s - The new full name

      • getDecrMinZ

        public int getDecrMinZ()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModel
        Returns a new minimum for the z value (height level) of all elements (The lowest level used by existing elements - 1). Returns the current minimum if there are no elements.

        Note: The limit of MinInt should never be reachable during a session.
        Specified by:
        getDecrMinZ in interface IGuiModel
        Returns:
        The new minimum z value

      • getIncrMaxZ

        public int getIncrMaxZ()
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModel
        Returns a new maximum for the z value (height level) of all elements (The highest level used by existing elements + 1). Returns the current maximum if there are no elements.

        Note: The limit of MaxInt should never be reachable during a session.
        Specified by:
        getIncrMaxZ in interface IGuiModel
        Returns:
        The new maximum z value

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The z value of the specified node

      • isModified

        public boolean isModified()
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Returns true if this model has been modified, otherwise false.
        Specified by:
        isModified in interface IModel
        Returns:
        The current modified state of the model

      • setModified

        public void setModified(boolean b)
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Sets the "modified" attribute of this model. Use this method when changing persistent data (e.g. name and position of nodes).

        Note: It should also be used by the model controller to reset the "modified" attribute after loading a PNML file. Otherwise: The model would be marked as "modified" before the user has modified anything.
        Specified by:
        setModified in interface IModel
        Parameters:
        b - The new state

        Description copied from interface: IGuiModel

      • addPlace

        public void addPlace(java.lang.String id,
                     EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                     java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Adds a place to this model.

        Intended use: adding a place after a GUI event when the new place is without a name after creation.
        Specified by:
        addPlace in interface IModel
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of the place
        position - The position (center) of the place

      • addPlace

        public void addPlace(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                     java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Adds a place to this model.

        Note: Adds an additional parameter name to the other method addPlace(String id, EPlaceTokens initialTokens, Point position)

        Intended use: adding a place after reading from a PNML file because these places may have a name.
        Specified by:
        addPlace in interface IModel
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the place
        name - The name of the place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of the place
        position - The position (center) of the place

                          java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Adds a transition to this model.

        Note: Adds an additional parameter name to the other method addTransition(String id, Point position)

        Specified by:

      • addArc

        public void addArc(java.lang.String id,
                   java.lang.String sourceId,
                   java.lang.String targetId)
        Description copied from interface: IModel
        Adds an arc to this model.

        Note: This method should be the same for GUI events and reading from a PNML file because arcs will have all 3 attributes in both cases.
        Specified by:
        addArc in interface IModel
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arc
        sourceId - The id of the source (Place or Transition)
        targetId - The id of the target (Place or Transition)

        public void selectSingleElement(IGuiElement element)

        Note that this method calls clearSelection() first. The previous selection gets cleared if element is null.
        Specified by:

      • shiftPositionToMinXY

        private java.awt.Point shiftPositionToMinXY(java.awt.Point position)
        Increases x and y if the specified position is too far to the left or to the top. (Takes the size of GuiNode into consideration.)
        Parameters:
        position - The specified position
        Returns:
        The new position

      • updateMinZ

        private void updateMinZ()
        Updates the attribute minZValue with the current minimum value for all nodes. Sets the attribute to 0 if there are no nodes.

      • updateMaxZ

        private void updateMaxZ()
        Updates the attribute maxZValue with the current maximum value for all nodes. Sets the attribute to 0 if there are no nodes.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the DataPlace

      • highlightUnreachableGuiNode

        public void highlightUnreachableGuiNode(java.lang.String nodeId,
                                        boolean b)
        Description copied from interface: IGuiModel
        Handles the IGuiModelController request to update the status of the specified GUI node on the draw panel.
        Specified by:
        highlightUnreachableGuiNode in interface IGuiModel
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The id of the IDataNode
        b - True = unreachable; False = can be reached from the start place and can reach the end place
